info.name: Project1 SOAP ISBN checker
info.description: This project checks whether the ISBN no is valid or not by sending ISBN no to the server, and server will give response in boolean that is true or false. If ISBN no is valid it gives true else it gives false.

request.description: Generated from cURL: curl --location 'http://webservices.daehosting.com/services/isbnservice.wso' \--header 'Content-Type: text/xml; charset=utf-8' \--header 'SOAPAction: "http://webservices.daehosting.com/ISBN/IsValidISBN10"' \--data '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">  <soap:Body>    <IsValidISBN10 xmlns="http://webservices.daehosting.com/ISBN">      <sISBN>0-7475-3269-9</sISBN>    </IsValidISBN10>  </soap:Body></soap:Envelope>'
